thread.section_title: Vision Direct Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vision Direct Australia | www.visiondirect.com.au
thread.title: Dennis Sarson
thread.title_full: Vision Direct Australia reviewed by Dennis Sarson

author: Dennis Sarson
title: Dennis Sarson
text:
Ordered my first pair of Maui Jims after trying on a friend's pair. 'Wow' was the word. Vision Direct were right on the ball, probably the fastest delivery I've ever had from Hong Kong.. The sunnies themselves are perfect, exactly what I ordered and definitely genuine, the real deal.
One more happy customer that'll definitely be back. Thanks guys.
